title: Melbourne: Australia's garden city
brief_description: This panoramic tour of Victoria’s capital provides the viewer with a vibrant snapshot of Melbourne and its surroundings. Highlights of the tour include: a trip on Melbourne’s famous trams, beautiful parks and gardens, historic landmarks Como House and Werribee Park, Cook’s Cottage in the scenic Fitzroy gardens, Old Melbourne Gaol, the Dandenongs and Puffing Billy, Marysville, Sovereign Hill, Ballarat and surrounds, the National Wool Museum at Geelong, Phillip Island and the tranquil bush surroundings of Healesville Sanctuary.
